org.webcurator.core.util
Class WebServiceEndPoint

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.util.WebServiceEndPoint

public class WebServiceEndPoint
extends java.lang.Object

A class to encapsulate a web service end point. This is used to reduce duplication in the Spring configuration files.

Author:
beaumontb
